title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Cultural Heritage Data Augmentation: Machine Learning-Based Framework Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods to improve the accuracy and completeness of cultural heritage metadata by over 80% using hierarchical multimodal classifiers.
Learners can implement digital restoration models for damaged cultural heritage by applying image reconstruction techniques based on supervised/unsupervised learning.
Learners can longitudinally design a data augmentation framework and conduct project-based evaluations on real cultural heritage datasets.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
